Hadoop configuration files You can use the following Hadoop configuration files with the Hadoop FS origin:
To use Hadoop configuration files:
Store the files or a symlink to the files in the resources directory.
In the Hadoop FS origin, specify the location of the files. For a Cloudera Manager installation, automatically creates a symlink to the files named hadoop-conf. Enter hadoop-conf for the location of the files in the Hadoop FS origin.
Individual properties You can configure individual Hadoop properties in the origin. To add a Hadoop property, you specify the exact property name and the value. The Hadoop FS origin does not validate the property names or values.Individual properties override properties defined in the Hadoop configuration files.
